qas.question: How much money has GE said it will invest in 2008 for clean technology R&D?
How many green products did GE bring to market via its Ecoimagination program as of October 2008?
What was GE's new revenue target for its Ecoimagination program in 2010?
What type of lamp was introduced by GE as part of its Ecoimagination initiative?
What type of engine did GE bring to market as part of its Ecoimagination project?
In what year was the Ecomagination initiative introduced by GE?
How much did GE spend on its Ecomagination initiative in 2009?
How many green products did GE bring onto the market in 2009?
What were the number of green products released onto the market by GE in 2010?
How much did GE invest in it Ecomagination initiative in 2016?

context: GE has said that it will invest <a0_0><b6_0>$1.4 billion<b6_0/><a0_0/> in clean technology research and development in <b5_0>2008<b5_0/> as part of its Ecomagination initiative. As of October 2008, the scheme had resulted in <a1_0><b7_0><b8_0>70<b8_0/><b7_0/><a1_0/> green products being brought to market, ranging from <a3_0>halogen<a3_0/> lamps to <a4_0>biogas<a4_0/> engines. In 2007, GE raised the annual revenue target for its Ecomagination initiative from $20 billion in 2010 to <a2_0>$25 billion<a2_0/> following positive market response to its new product lines. In 2010, GE continued to raise its investment by adding <b9_0>$10 billion<b9_0/> into Ecomagination over the next five years.
